data.message:
Had another dream about my favorite artist Eminem last night and I remember ever vivid detail like it was like the dream went on for hours
It felt so real that when I woke up I almost cried cuz I realized it wasn't
Ik it seems silly but in the dream I met him and got to sing and record with him and actually get advice on music from him
It was amazing and I want it to happen so bad
I want to work hard to the point where I can actually do that and he actually thinks I'm one of the artists that deserves his time
I mean I won't die and quit as an artist if it never happens but it is something I will always be working for
